name: Large Tote fantastic fish!
description:
Fabulous firm upholstery fabric with a slate gray background and fish done in soft yellow, pale gray and black. Lining is a coordinating lighter weight upholstery fabric in black with diamonds and little flowers. Three 6.5" wide and 9" deep pockets are fully lined in a a patterned gold. Magnetic closure with a decorative vintage button. One inch wide black leather shoulder straps are made exclusively for me here in Vermont. Great access to your work, tommy and efficient. Love it!

Bag measures 22" from side seam to side seam, has a 5.25" base pleat and is 13.5' tall. Total length of leather straps is 22".

Additional pictures of this bag may be seen on the Facebook page!

Shipping fees for bags sent out of the US will be adjusted accordingly.

name: Striking Geometric no pocket tote
description:
Sometimes I want something without pockets to just place a project in and go! Striking geometric in red, rose, pale red/pink, charcoal and black. Lining is a coordinating upholstery fabric in black and champagne. No pockets. Magnetic closure with a decorative vintage black glass button. One inch wide black leather straps are made exclusively for me here in Vermont. Nice size bag, low and wide. New tags...

Bag measures 21" from side seam to side seam, has a 3" base pleat and is 9.75" tall. Total length of leather straps is 15".

Additional pictures of this bag can be seen on the Facebook page!

Shipping fees for bags sent out of the US will be adjusted accordingly.

name: Fiber Assistant 1 oz. Purse size
description:
Created specifically for fiber enthusiasts, this unique mist is a repellent against moths and other unwanted critters that like to feast on your precious projects.
These all natural spritzers are a pleasant, non-toxic and convenient way to care for your treasured fibers. Bottled by hand in Vermont.
Made with therapeutic grade essential oils in a base of distilled water, this spray includes a special blend of rosemary, cloves, cedar, lemon, eucalyptus and lavender. A perfect addition to your Green Mountain Knitting bag!

Choose your bottle color, and shipping is included.

name: Hybrid/Willa red Calla Lilies
description:
Tis the season for pairing these colors and I couldn't resist! Red upholstery fabric with calla lilies and leaves. design shades include greens, soft yellow, yellow gold, violet and sky blue. Lining is fabulous upholstery fabric in greens with ovals in red pink, gold, yellow and white. Four 5.25" wide and 7.5" deep pockets are fully lined in a holiday red stripe. Magnet closure with a decorative vintage red button. Opens wide, stable sit. Large size bag. Vermont Maple handles, pale and warmâ€¦

Bag measures 23" from side seam to side seam, has a 5" base pleat and is 13.25" tall not including the handles which measure 13" X 4".

Additional pics of this bag can be viewed on the Facebook page!

Shipping fees for bags sent out of the US will be adjusted accordingly.

name: Hybrid double sided pockets small/medium

Lining is a designer check, love these two together. Double pockets, on one side are three 6" wide and 7.5" deep fully lined interior pockets and on the other side, is a 12.75" wide and 7.5" deep pocket with a magnetic closure in the center, and another 4.75" wide pocket next to that. Deep, firm pockets and fully lined in a irredescent blue. Magnetic closure with a lovely decorative vintage button. Nice opening.. a neat bag in that it's just between a small and medium size bag, but it has nice height and the additional pocket, so it can hold a lot. Vermont Cherry handles, gorgeous lines.

Bag measures 19.75" from side seam to side seam, has a 5" base pleat and is 13" tall not including the handles which measure 13" X 4".

name: Lil Yarn Sack zebrasâ€¦.
description:
These lil' sacks fit beautifully in the bottom of my knitting bag. At times I knit from my bag, and at times I carry my project from room to room, and having the yarn (or project) in the lil' sack is such a practical (and pretty) way to keep your skeins clean, easy to carry and tangle free. Useful too when doing two color knitting. They stand up beautifully as they're made from top quality tapestry and upholstery fabrics, and have a generous pleated base....they are, in a way...a portable pocket. No knitter can have too many! Oh, there are no exposed seams so they're completely reversible..... I'm thrilled with these lovely lil' sacks, mix them, match them...but mostly, enjoy them!

Tapestry upholstery fabric in deep manila, black, off white and soft yellow greens. Black and yellow gold upholstery fabric lining.

Measures 9.5 from side seam to side seam, has a 3.5" base pleat and is 8." tall.

Shipping fees for bags sent out of the US will be adjusted accordingly.
